page.title: 10KIRKGATE FARM, BROMPTON
page.content: I live on a farm.We have{Beef {fattening cattle},we have got some{ {pigs}as well but we have only got 20.We have just cut our hay and at weekends we will have to go and help get it in before it gets wet. We also have 32{ponies},we{show} them.When I get home from school I ride my ponies,I have some ponies that jump and some that don't jump.My sister goes to boarding school and we have to go and collect her o Saturday morning.She has some ponies too,we both show but she has mainly got jumping ponies and I have both. When my dad gets up he goes straight over to the cattle yard and feeds up before he does anything else. We employ 3 people to help on our 76 acre farm 2{grooms}and a{stockman.}
